definition: towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...

sentences.english: But that doctor may also use value-laden language to describe the options.
sentences.chinese: 但是醫生也會使用具有價值取向的語言描述這些選項。

sentences.english: The last part is an analysis of the grandness-orientation in aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分則對漢賦以大爲美的價值取向進行了分析。

sentences.english: Fourth, the traditional social philosophy is pluralistic in its values.
sentences.chinese: 傳統處世哲學在價值層面呈現著多元取向。

sentences.english: The aesthetic value-orientation of literature in Wei-Jin limes and the Six Dynasties obviously advocated "purity".
sentences.chinese: 魏晉六朝文學審美價值取向明顯尚清。

sentences.english: The value orientation and objective effect of Liang Qichao's thought in popularization.
sentences.chinese: 梁啓超大衆化文學思想的價值取向與客觀效果。

sentences.english: Pride and prejudice, money, matrimonial value orientation, marriage.
sentences.chinese: 傲慢與偏見，金錢，婚姻價值取向，婚姻觀。

sentences.english: The lowest Hofstede Dimension for the Netherlands is Masculinity (MAS) at 14.
sentences.chinese: 最低得分的一個維度是男性氣質取向，14。

sentences.english: The life characteristic was the value tropism in modern moral education.
sentences.chinese: 生活性道德教育是現代道德教育的價值取向。

sentences.english: He sponsored legislation in Illinois that would ban discrimination on the basis of sexual orientation.
sentences.chinese: 在伊州，他資助了一項禁止性取向歧視的立法。

sentences.english: It is the consensus of Chinese competitive tennis circle that the tennis game should be professionalized now.
sentences.chinese: 走職業化道路，是中國競技網球多年來無爭的取向。

sentences.english: It is in the implementation of the official activities of civil servants in one of the basic value orientation.
sentences.chinese: 它是公務員在執行公務活動中的一種基本價值取向。

sentences.english: The magnetic properties and the domain refining effect of laser grooving are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究取向硅鋼板磁性及激光刻痕細化磁疇的效果。

sentences.english: To date, no researcher has claimed that genes can determine sexual orientation.
sentences.chinese: 直至今日，沒有研究人士聲稱基因可以決定性取向。
同性戀取向在家族中流行。

sentences.english: For amorphous materials, there are usually more issues with orientation problems.
sentences.chinese: 對不定形塑料，關於取向有更多的問題。

sentences.english: Chapter six is our measures of export oriented mariculture under the requirements of WTO.
sentences.chinese: 第六章提出WTO框架下我國海水養殖業的政策取向。

definition: to prefer/to be partial to sth/preference
